title: Countryside campaigners: four women who fought for our green spaces
itunes:title: Countryside campaigners: four women who fought for our green spaces
itunes:subtitle: Matthew Kelly explores the lives of four women who helped to protect the English countryside in the 19th and 20th centuries
description:
Professor Matthew Kelly tells David Musgrove the story of four women who helped to protect and preserve the English countryside from the 1870s through to the 1970s, battling for public access to natural spaces.

(Ad) Matthew Kelly is the author of The Women Who Saved the English Countryside (Yale University Press, 2022). Buy it now from Waterstones:

https://go.skimresources.com?id=71026X1535947&xcust=historyextra-social-histboty&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.waterstones.com%2Fbook%2Fthe-women-who-saved-the-english-countryside%2Fmatthew-kelly%2F9780300232240


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
